Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.

Modo de doctoribus disputantibus cum jhesu in templo. Primus doctor Scripture sacre esse dinoscimur doctos We to bere Ã¾e belle of all manere clergyse. ijus doctor Velud rosa omnium florum flos lyke on to us was nevyr clerke so wyse. ius doctor Loke what scyens ?e kan devyse of redynge wrytynge and trewe ortografye Amonges all clerkys we bere Ã¾e prysse of gramer cadens and of prosodye. ijus doctor No clerke Abyl to bere oure book of versyfyeng nor of other scyens of Swete musyke who so wyll look seke no ferther but to oure presens Of dyaletyk we haue Ã¾e hy? excellence of sophestrye logyk and phylosophye Ageyn oure argemente is no recystence In metaphesyk ne astronomye. ius doctor Of calculacion and negremauncye Also of Augrym and of asmatryk O lynyacion Ã¾at longyth to jematrye of dyetis and domys Ã¾at longyth to phesyk In all Ã¾is scyens is non us lyke In caton gryscysme nor doctrynal and ffor endytynge with retoryke Ã¾e hyest degre is oure be call. ijus doctor In grett canon and in Cevyle lawe Also in scyens of polycye Is non to us warthe An hawe of all cunnynge we bere Ã¾e maystrye Therfore in Ã¾is temple we sytt on hye and of most wurchep kepe Ã¾e souereynte Ã¾er is on erthe no man so wurthye Ã¾e hy? stat to holdyn as we tweyn be. Jhesus Omnis sciencia a domino deo est Al wytt and wysdam of god it is lent Of all ?our lernynge with-inne ?our brest thank hyghly Ã¾at lord Ã¾at hath ?ow sent thorwe bost and pryde ?our soulys may be shent Of wytt and wysdome ?e haue not so mech but god may make at hese entente of all ?our connynge many man ?ow lech. ius doctor Goo hom lytyl babe and sytt on Ã¾i moderys lappe and put a mokador a-forn Ã¾i brest and pray Ã¾i modyr to fede Ã¾e with Ã¾e pappe of Ã¾e for to lerne we desyre not to lest. ijus doctor Go to Ã¾i dyner for Ã¾at be-hovyth the best whan Ã¾ou art a-threste Ã¾an take Ã¾e A sowke Aftyr go to cradyl Ã¾er-in to take Ã¾i rest Ffor Ã¾at canst Ã¾ou do bettyr Ã¾an for to loke on book. Jhesus Stondynge Ã¾at ?e be so wytty and wyse Can ?e owth tellyn how Ã¾is werde was wrought how longe xal it laste can ?e devyse with all Ã¾e cunnyge Ã¾at ?e han sought. ius doctor Nay all erthely clerkys Ã¾at telle can nought it passyth oure wytt Ã¾at for to contryve It is not possyble A-bought to be brought Ã¾e worldys endyng no man kan dyscryve. Jhesus How it was wrought and how longe it xal endure Ã¾at I telle be good delyberacion not only Ã¾er-of but of every creature How it is wrought I knowe Ã¾e plasmacion. ijus doctor Of Ã¾i wurdys I haue skorne and deryson how schulde a chylde Ã¾at nevyr lettyr dude lere Com to Ã¾e wytt of so hy? cognysion Of Ã¾o grete wurkys Ã¾at so wundyrfull were. Jhesus All thynge is brought to informacion be thre personys oo god in trynite and on of Ã¾o thre hath take in-carnacion bothe flesch and blood of a mayd ffre And be Ã¾at myght of Ã¾o personys thre hevyn and erth and all thynge is wrought and as it plesyth Ã¾at hy? mageste all thynge xal leste and lenger nowght. ius doctor I grawnt weyl all thynge Ã¾at god dyde make and with-owtyn hym no thynge may be But o thynge Ã¾ou seydyst and Ã¾at I for-sake Ã¾at oo god alone was personys thre Ryght on-possyble Ã¾at is to me that on is thre I kan not thynke If Ã¾ou canst preve it a-non lett se Ffor in oure hertys it may nevyr synke. Jhesus In Ã¾e sunne consydyr ?e thyngys thre The splendure Ã¾e hete and Ã¾e lyght as Ã¾o thre partys but oo sunne be Ryght so thre personys be oo god of myght. ijus doctor In very feyth Ã¾is reson is ryght but ?itt fayr babe oo thynge we pray ?ow what do all Ã¾o thre personys hyght Vs to enforme ?e sey to me now. Jhesus The fyrst is calde Ã¾e fadyr of myght Ã¾e secunde Ã¾e sone of wysdam and wytt Ã¾e holy gost Ã¾e iijd e. of grace he is hyght and in oo substauns all these iij. be knyt. ius doctor A-nother questyon I Aske ?ow ?itt ?e seyd on of Ã¾ese iij. toke flesch and blood and sche a clene mayde I kan not be-leue it clene mayde and modyr nevyr ?it in oo persone stood. Jhesus Lyke as Ã¾e sunne doth perysch Ã¾e glas Ã¾e glas not hurte of his nature ryght so Ã¾e godhed entryd has Ã¾e virgynes wombe and sche mayd pure That maydonys childe xal do grett cure convicte Ã¾e devyl in Ã¾e opyn felde and with his bolde berst fecch hom his creature mankende to saue his brest xal be Ã¾e shelde. ijus doctor This childys doctryne doth passe oure wytt Sum Aungel of hevyn I trowe Ã¾at he be But blyssyd babe of oo dowte ?itt We pray ?ow enforme us for charyte Which toke flesch of Ã¾e personys thre Ageyn Ã¾e fende to holde such batayle. Jhesus The secunde persone for sothe is he xal fray Ã¾e fende with-owte fayle. ius doctor Why rather he than Any of Ã¾at other The fyrst or Ã¾e thyrde why come they nowth. Jhesus this is Ã¾e cawse why sertys and non other Ageyn Ã¾e secunde Ã¾e trespas was wrought Whan Ã¾e serpent adam to synne browth He temptyd hym nowght be Ã¾e faderys myght Of Ã¾e gostys goodnes spak he ryght nowght but in connynge he temptyd hym ryght. Myght is Ã¾e faderys owyn propyrte to Ã¾e gost apperyd is goodnes in none of these tweyn temptyd he mankende to synne whan he dede dresse To Ã¾e sone connynge doth longe expres ther with Ã¾e serpent dyd Adam A-say Ete of Ã¾is Appyl he seyd no lesse and Ã¾ou xalt haue connynge as god verray. Ãus Ã¾e secunde person Attrybute Was only towchyd be temptacion Wherfore hym self wyl hold Ã¾e sewte And kepe his propyrte fro maculacion. ijus doctor This is An hevynly declaracion oure naturall wytt it doth excede so ?onge a childe of such informacion in al Ã¾is werld neuyr er non ?ede. ius doctor We be not worthy to kepe Ã¾is sete Whyll Ã¾at oure mayster is in presens Ã¾e maystry of us Ã¾is childe doth gete We must hym wurchep with hy? reverens Come forth swete babe of grett excellens Ã¾e whysest clerke Ã¾at evyr ?ett was born to ?ow we ?eve Ã¾e hy? resydens Vs more to teche as ?e haue done be-forn. hic adducunt ihesum inter ipsos et in scanno altiori ipsum sedere faciunt ipsis in inferioribus scannis sedentibus et ait iju s doctor 2us doctor So ?onge A chylde suche clergye to reche and so sadly to sey it we woundyr sore Who was ?owre mayster who dede ?ow teche of what man had ?e Ã¾is wurthy lore. Jhesus My wytt and my lernynge is no ?onge store or Ã¾is worde was wrought all Ã¾inge dede I knowe Ffyrst or ?e wore borne ?erys many score thorwe Ã¾e myght of my fadyr my wytt in me dede flowe. ius doctor Or Ã¾at we weryn born nay Ã¾at may nat be Ã¾e ?ongest of us tweyn is iij. score ?ere of Age and Ã¾i-selfe art but a chylde al men may wel se late camst out of cradyl as it semyth be Ã¾i vesage. Jhesus I am of dobyl byrth and of dobyl lenage Ffyrst be my fadyr I am with-out gynnynge And lyke as he is hendeles in his hy? stage So xal I also neuyr mor haue endynge. Ffor be my ffadyr kynge celestyall With-out begynnyng I am endles but be my modyr Ã¾at is carnall I am but xij ?ere of age Ã¾at is expres My body of ?ough? doth shewe wyttnes Which of my modyr here I dude take but myn hy? godhede Ã¾is is no lesse all thynge in Ã¾is world for sothe dude I make. ijus doctor Be ?our ffadyr Ã¾at endles is Who is ?our modyr telle us we pray. Jhesus Be my fadyr Ã¾e hy? kynge of blys A modyrles chylde I am veray. ius doctor Who was ?our ffadyr to us than say be ?our modyr A woman Ã¾at was. Jhesus I am fadyrles as for Ã¾at may of fleschly luste she dude nevyr trespas ijus doctor Telle us I pray ?ow what is ?our name what hyght ?oure modyr telle us Also. Jhesu Jhesu of Nazareth I am Ã¾e same born of a clene mayd prophetys seyd so Ysaye seyd Ã¾us Ecce virgo A mayd xal conceyve in clennes a chylde ?itt ageyn nature and alkende loo ffrom all wem of synne pure and vndefylde. Mary Ã¾e chylde of Joachym And anne ys Ã¾at clene mayd and here childe am I Ã¾e frute of here wombe xal saue euery manne Ffrom Ã¾e grett dowte of Ã¾e ffyndys tormentry. ius doctor All Ã¾e clerkys of Ã¾is worlde trewly can not brynge this to declaracion lesse Ã¾an Ã¾ei haue of god Almyghty Sum influens of informacion ijus doctor No jentyl jhesu we ?ow pray Whyl Ã¾at we stodye a whyle to dwelle In cas mo dowtys Ã¾at we fynde may Ã¾e trewth of hem ?e may us telle. Jhesu Goo take ?our stodye and avyse ?ow well And all ?our leysere I xal a-byde If Any dowtys to me ?e mell Ã¾e trewth Ã¾erof I xall vn-hyde. Maria Alas Alas myn hert is wo My blyssyd babe a-wey is went I wott nevyr whedyr Ã¾at he is go Alas for sorwe myn hert is rent Jentyl husbond haue hym sent Out on herrande to Any place but yf ?e knowe were her ys bent myn hert for woo A-sondyr wyl race. Joseph On my massage I hym not sent forsothe good wyff in no degre how longe is it Ã¾at he hens went What tyme dude ?e ?our childe last se. Maria Trewly gode spowse not Ã¾ese days thre Ã¾erfore myn herte is cast in care hym for to seke wher so he be in hast good husbonde lete us forth fare. Joseph Than to hjerusalem lete us streyte wende Ffor kynred gladly to-gedyr wole gon I hope he Ã¾er with sum good ffrende Ã¾er he hath cosynys ryght many on. Maria I am aferde Ã¾at he hath fon Ffor his grett wyttys and werkys good lyke hym of wytt ffor-soth is non Euery childe with hym is wroth and wood. Also my babe my blys my blood Whedyr art Ã¾ou Ã¾us gon fro me my sowle my swetyng my frute myn ffood Send me ssum wurd where Ã¾at Ã¾ou be Telle me good serys for charyte Jhesu my childe Ã¾at babe of blysse Amonge Ã¾is companye dude ?e hym se Ffor godys hy? loue telle where he is. ius doctor Of oo qwestyon I am be-thought All of ?our modyr Ã¾at blyssyd may In what governauns is she brought How is sche rewlyd be nyght and day. Jhesu An old man joseph as I ?ow say here weddyd be meracle on to his Wyff Here for to fede and kepe Alway and bothyn in clennesse be maydonys Olyff. ijus doctor What nede was it here to be wedde On to A man of so grett Age lesse Ã¾an Ã¾ei myght bothe ago to bedde and kept Ã¾e lawe of maryage. Jhesus To blynde Ã¾e devyl of his knowlache and my byrth from hym to hyde Ã¾at holy wedlok was grett stopage Ã¾e devyl in dowte to do A-byde. Also whan sche xulde to egypte gon and fle from herowde for dowte of me be-cawse she xulde nat go Alon Joseph was ordeyned here make to be my ffadyr of his hy? mageste here for to comforte in Ã¾e way these be Ã¾e cawsys as ?e may se why joseph weddyd Ã¾at holy may. Maria A dere childe dere chylde why hast Ã¾ou Ã¾us done Ffor Ã¾e we haue had grett sorwe and care thy ffadyr and I thre days haue gone Wyde Ã¾e to seke of blysse ful bare. Jhesus Why haue ?e sought me with evy fare Wete ?e not wele I muste been A-monge hem Ã¾at is my faderys ware his gostly catel for to ovyrsen. Maria ?our ffaderys wyl must nedys be wrought It is most wurthy Ã¾at it so be ?itt on ?our modyr haue ?e sum thought And be nevyr more so longe fro me As to my thynkynge these days thre Ã¾at ?e Absente haue ben A-way be more lengere in Ã¾er degre Ã¾an All Ã¾e space of xij ?ere day. Jhesus Now ffor to plese my modyr mylde I xal ?ow folwe with obedyence I am ?our sone and subjecte childe and Owe to do ?ow hy? reverence home with ?ow I wyl go hens Of ?ow clerkys my leve I take Euery childe xulde with good dyligens his modyr to plese his owyn wyl forsake. ius doctor O blyssyd jhesu with ?ow we wende of ?ow to haue more informacion Fful blyssyd is ?our modyr hende of whom ?e toke ?our incarnacion we pray ?ow jhesu of consolacion At oure most nede of ?ow to haue all Ã¾at hath herd Ã¾is consummacion of Ã¾is pagent ?our grace Ã¾em saue.
